title: How many blogs can I write after creating one website? - Quora

response.answer_text: Although you can write unlimited blog after making one website. And if you want to get approved from adsense you have to write minimum 100 posts . And the trending website of today have about 10000 posts too so it's depend on you how much you write and also on your hosting how much space does it provides. Thank You If you liked my answer, Could I get an Upvote?
Are you using WordPress? If so, you can publish any number of blog posts in your blogging website. I think I have understood in this way.
